# Watermelon

## Common Names

Language|String
-|-
`en`|watermelon
`sv`|vattenmelon
`pt`|melancia


## Data

Key|Value
-|-
`botanial_name`|Citrullus lanatus
`botanical_family`|Cucurbitaceae
`botanical_family_en`|Gourd family
`culinary_use`|Fruit
`wikipedia_en_url`|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Watermelon
`height_cm_min`|300
`height_cm_max`|300
`spread_cm_min`|40
`spread_cm_max`|40
`maturity_days_min`|120
`maturity_days_max`|120
